JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: BRAC IT Services Ltd. (biTS) is an IT Solution and Services company and is a subsidiary jointly owned by BRAC and BRAC Bank. biTS focuses to become the most trustworthy company in Bangladesh providing technology solutions and managing IT Services. biTS provides end-to-end solutions for industries like Banks, Non-Banking Financial Institutes, Educational Institutes, Micro-Finance, NGOs, FMCG etc.
EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS: M.Sc or B.Sc in computer Science and engineering from any reputed public or private university
ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS: Advanced knowledge of architectural styles and design patterns; Broad and extensive knowledge of the software development process and its technologies;Understanding of various coding methods and computer languages;Data modeling and database design experience;Experience with software development lifecycle (SDLC) processes;Experience with service-oriented architecture (SOA);Communication and collaboration skill to interact with clients, product managers and developers.
COMPENSATION & AND OTHER BENEFITS: Mobile bill, Tour allowance, Performance bonus, Provident fund, Weekly 2 holidays, Insurance, GratuityFestival Bonus: 2
